patthana18.20:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.20:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.20:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.20:3.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
